objects.description: [Gazer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0168) can establish persistence by creating a .lnk file in the Start menu or by modifying existing .lnk files to execute the malware through cmd.exe.(Citation: ESET Gazer Aug 2017)(Citation: Securelist WhiteBear Aug 2017)

external_references.description: ESET. (2017, August). Gazing at Gazer: Turla’s new second stage backdoor. Retrieved September 14, 2017.
Kaspersky Lab's Global Research & Analysis Team. (2017, August 30). Introducing WhiteBear. Retrieved September 21, 2017.
